content:
I am planning a trip to the poorest country in Europe I have not been to before. Can you provide me with the details of the country, including its capital, region, and currency? Additionally, I would like to know the list of states within the country and their respective latitude and longitude.
Begin!

name: country_details_for_referential_db
content: The tool output is {"error": "", "response": "{'id': '144', 'name': 'Moldova', 'code': 'MD', 'iso3': 'MDA', 'capital': 'Chisinau', 'region': 'Europe', 'subregion': 'Eastern Europe', 'native': 'Moldova', 'currency': 'Moldovan leu', 'currency_code': 'MDL', 'phonecode': '373', 'timezones': '[{\"zoneName\":\"Europe/Chisinau\",\"gmtOffset\":7200,\"gmtOffsetName\":\"UTC+02:00\",\"abbreviation\":\"EET\",\"tzName\":\"Eastern European Time\"}]', 'translations': '{\"kr\":\"\ubab0\ub3c4\ubc14\",\"pt-BR\":\"Mold\u00e1via\",\"pt\":\"Mold\u00e1via\",\"nl\":\"Moldavi\u00eb\",\"hr\":\"Moldova\",\"fa\":\"\u0645\u0648\u0644\u062f\u0627\u0648\u06cc\",\"de\":\"Moldawie\",\"es\":\"Moldavia\",\"fr\":\"Moldavie\",\"ja\":\"\u30e2\u30eb\u30c9\u30d0\u5171\u548c\u56fd\",\"it\":\"Moldavia\",\"cn\":\"\u6469\u5c14\u591a\u74e6\",\"tr\":\"Moldova\"}', 'tld': '.md', 'emoji': '\ud83c\uddf2\ud83c\udde9', 'latitude': '47.00000000', 'longitude': '29.00000000'}"}, remember to call Finish tool when either if you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

function.arguments:
{"final_answer":"The poorest country in Europe I have not been to before is Moldova.

Country Details:

* Region: Europe
* Currency: Moldovan leu

I am unable to provide a list of states within Moldova and their latitude and longitude using the available tools.","return_type":"give_answer"}
